rules.natural: Either the artwork shows indicators of being a forgery, or the artwork is confirmed as genuine.
If the artwork is investigated by the legal team, then the artwork does not violate copyright laws.
If the artwork is created by a verified artist, then the artwork is confirmed as genuine.
If the artwork undergoes a provenance verification check, then provided that the artwork is not created by a verified artist, the artwork does not have uncertain provenance documentation.
If the artwork is approved for public display on the platform, then the artwork does not show indicators of being a forgery.
Either the artwork contains prohibited or harmful content, or if the artwork is reported by multiple users, then the artwork does not violate copyright laws.
If the artwork matches patterns associated with digital art diseases, then the artwork does not contain prohibited or harmful content.
Either the artwork matches patterns associated with digital art diseases, or the artwork triggers the platform's quarantine protocol.
If the artwork receives authorization from the platform, then the artwork passes the automated authenticity scan.
Either the artwork receives authorization from the platform, or the artwork undergoes manual review by experts.
If the artwork triggers the platform's quarantine protocol, then the artwork is isolated from public view.
If the artwork is isolated from public view, then the artwork does not contain prohibited or harmful content.
If the artwork undergoes manual review by experts, then the artwork does not show indicators of being a forgery.
If the artwork was uploaded during the specified time period, then should the artwork pass the automated authenticity scan, the artwork does not show indicators of being a forgery.
If the artwork is flagged by AI detection systems, then the artwork is confirmed as genuine.
Either the artwork violates copyright laws, or the artwork is confirmed as genuine.

If it is not the case that the artwork receiving authorization from the platform leads to the artwork being approved for public display on the platform, then the artwork does not enter the appeal process.
If it is not the case that the artwork being reported by multiple users leads to the artwork being investigated by the legal team, then the artwork is ignored by the moderation system.
If it is not the case that the artwork being reported by multiple users leads to the artwork being investigated by the legal team, then the artwork is not ignored by the moderation system.

If it is not the case that the failure of the artwork receiving authorization from the platform to lead to the artwork being approved for public display on the platform results in the artwork entering the appeal process, then the artwork receives a final judgment from the platform.

If it is not the case that the failure of the artwork receiving authorization from the platform to lead to the artwork being approved for public display on the platform results in the artwork entering the appeal process, then the artwork does not receive a final judgment from the platform.
If the artwork is not created by a verified artist, then the artwork has uncertain provenance documentation.
If the artwork is not flagged by AI detection systems, then the artwork is cleared by the human review team.
If the artwork is not flagged by AI detection systems, then the artwork is not cleared by the human review team.
